item.description:
Taoist Yoga & Meditation with Christine

During Taoist practice, lower abdominal breathing is performed while visualizing the the second navel chakra, or energy center just below the belly button. Using breath control and visualization to balance the second chakra will automatically attune all the other chakras and create vital healing energy within the body.

A well-balanced second chakra results in a satisfied appetite for life, especially increased physical gratification, emotional fulfillment and creative expression.

Before and after meditation, stretches will be performed to loosen and relax the body, and to circulate vital energy throughout the inner organ systems.

A $5 donation is requested to support the operations of the Growing Green Co-op's community center and healing arts space.
item.name: Taoist Yoga & Meditation
